channel.title: Function IsEven(num : integer) : boolean;
channel.description:
Made this fuction for a combat calculator I'm making and thought it might be useful for others. It will return true if the number is even and false if the number is odd. Dunno what it could be used for [scar] Function IsEven(num : integer) : boolean; var num2: extended; begin num2:= num / 2; if (num2 = round(num2)) then result:= true else result:= false; End; [/scar]
Example:
[scar] if IsEven(22) = true then writeln('The number is even!') else writeln('The number is odd!') [/scar]

item.title: Function IsEven(num : integer) : boolean;
item.dc:creator: @Decelo Decelo
item.description:
@Decelo wrote:

Made this fuction for a combat calculator I’m making and thought it might be useful for others.
It will return true if the number is even and false if the number is odd.
Dunno what it could be used for
[scar]
Function IsEven(num : integer) : boolean;
var
num2: extended;
begin
num2:= num / 2;
if (num2 = round(num2)) then
result:= true
else
result:= false;
End;
[/scar]

Example:

[scar]
if IsEven(22) = true then
writeln(‘The number is even!’)
else
writeln(‘The number is odd!’)
[/scar]

Read full topic
